price: Dan kepunyaan Allah-lah segala apa yang tersembunyi di langit dan di bumi.  Tidak adalah kejadian kiamat itu, melainkan seperti sekejap mata atau lebih cepat (lagi).  Sesungguhnya Allah Maha Kuasa atas segala sesuatu.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ غَيۡبُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَمَآ أَمۡرُ ٱلسَّاعَةِ إِلَّا كَلَمۡحِ ٱلۡبَصَرِ أَوۡ هُوَ أَقۡرَبُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walillahi ghaybu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā amru al-sāʿati illā kalamḥi al-baṣari aw huwa aqrabu inna al-laha ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
